title: Connected Breaths Breathwork Meditation
description: Naturally Boost Your Mood, Energy, Creativity, Brain and Health
text:
Breath is the essence of our being. There’s healing power in our breath. Power to balance. Power to heal. Power to rejuvenate. Power to invigorate. Power to elevate. Power to create. Power to connect. It’s all available to you when you learn to breathe with intention. And Connected Breaths can show you how. All it takes is one hour or less to de-stress, unwind, and feel like a million bucks.
[Try a breathwork meditation](https://lisaosiecki.krtra.com/t/xLnIpmlsXvYf)
and see for yourself!
SOMA Breathwork meditation combines the embodiment of elevated emotions with rhythmic breathing techniques (pranayama yoga) and inspirational music to raise vibrational energy and improve heart coherence. When done as a group, the positive effects are even more amplified.
SOMA Breathwork is good for anyone who wants to:
- Naturally help manage chronic conditions
- Lose weight
- Increase energy
- Access more creative states of mind
- Heal quicker
- Get deeper sleep
- Improve digestion
- Live longer
- Improve mood
- Reduce anxiety/panic
- Reduce inflammation
- Activate brain power
- Stimulate sinus clearing
From brand new to experienced meditators, ALL are welcome and encouraged! Want a meditation experience that activates elevated emotions and lifts vibrational energy with the natural healing power of breath? This is it! If you tried meditating before and didn't think it "worked"? Try breathwork!
